entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as being summoned by Dumbledore.

entities.name: madame maxi
entities.description: Madame Maxime is the headmistress of Beauxbaton Academy and is introduced in the text.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and is mentioned as welcoming the guests.

entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbaton Academy is a school from France that has sent students to attend Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Madame Maxime is the headmistress of Beauxbaton Academy.
Dumbledore welcomed the students from Beauxbaton Academy.
Madame Maxime sat next to Dumbledore.
